definition[0]: the part of a helmet (=protective hard hat) that can be lowered to protect your face
definition[1]: the curved part of a cap that sticks out in front above your eyes
definition[2]: a flat object fixed above the front window inside a car that can be moved down to keep the sun out of your eyes
definition[3]: a curved piece of plastic that you wear on your head so that it sticks out above your eyes and protects them from the sun
